ValidationRule.description: This rule checks if the Case meets the minimum requirements before handing it over to Technical 2nd line queue
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name ='Noordhoff', ISCHANGED( OwnerId ), Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'NoordhoffTH', OR( ISPICKVAL( Type , 'Question'), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Open')), ISBLANK(AccountId) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To handover a Case to 'Technical Help' please make sure the Type is not a 'Question', the Status is 'Open' and Account is filled.
